form.label: Why do you wish to join the EMS team?
Q1: You are driving along a Street when you notice someone is down on the sidewalk but you have not received a 911 call. What should you do?
values: Stop and tell them Out of Character that they need to call 911 till you will treat them
Just drive past as they have to call 911 for EMS to respond
Stop next to them and just revive them without doing anything else
Stop and treat the person on the floor for any injuries that they may have in the correct manner

form.label: Q2: You are on duty as EMS, what clothing are you permitted to be wearing?
values: Civilian clothing
Police uniform
EMS uniform
It doesn't matter as long as you perform your job

form.label: Q3: While on duty and driving a service vehicle, which rules of the road apply to you and when do they apply?
values: Only stop signs and traffic lights. EMS can travel at any speed at anytime they wish
All the rules of the road apply at all times in conjunction with emergency response policies
All the rules of the road apply at all times
None of the rules of the road apply at any time

form.label: Q4: You have multiple 911 calls coming from all across the city; How would you respond to the calls?
values: Go grab a coffee and some food because you are hungry
Go to the call that is closest to you
First come first serve basis
Judge the calls by severity and respond accordingly

form.label: Q5: What items are you allowed to use while on duty as EMS?
values: Flares, Flare Gun, Fire extinguisher, Flashlight & Knife
Pistol, Flares, Flare Gun, Fire extinguisher & Flashlight
Machine Gun, Flare Gun, Fire extinguisher & Flashlight
Flares, Flare Gun, Fire extinguisher & Flashlight

form.label: Q6: You respond to a 911 call arriving to an individual that has been injured. You perform all the required treatment at the scene and you deem they should go to the hospital for further treatment but they refuse to go what should you do?
values: Don’t worry about it, just let them go
Report it to one of the police and tie up police time too
Ask them to sign a form that states they’re going AMA (Against Medical Advice)
Force them into the ambulance and take them to the hospital against their will

form.label: Q7: In your own words, explain three reasons to go 'Code Three'
Q8: You arrive to a shooting and declare someone dead. What actions would be required from you?

Q9: You arrive on scene and treat someone for a broken leg. What treatment would you give? Would you take the patient back to the hospital for further treatment? If you would, what road rules would you follow?
Q10: You respond to a street fight and you find two man knocked out after punches have been exchanged. What treatment would you give? Should the patient(s) be transported to the hospital? Why?

I acknowledge that my LEO character is to only be used when ON DUTY and that there is no "Off Duty" Law Enforcement Officer. Any time that I am not roleplaying as LEO, I am to use a different Character.
